api_list.name: Status for mapper
api_list.description: Get results in details from the task id.

api_list.name: CollectFactorswithMongoDB
api_list.description: Check if the factor in mapping table is correct.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://carbon-management.p.rapidapi.com/mapping/collect/factors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "carbon-management.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
